sentences.en: Emphasis was placed on the school as a transmitter of moral values.
sentences.cn: 人们强调学校为道德价值观的传输者。

sentences.en: He activated the door with the miniature sonic transmitter.
sentences.cn: 他用微型声波发射器开启了门。

sentences.en: He broadcasted in the transmitter - receiver in evening yesterday.
sentences.cn: 他昨天晚上在电台播音.

sentences.en: Record Himself ( Lift ) explores the mechanisms of the video transmitter and receiver.
sentences.cn: 自拍 ( 降机 ) 尝试利用这段片来探查影像发射器与影像接收器的工作方式.

sentences.en: The microphone, you see, acts much like a telephone transmitter.
sentences.cn: 你看, 传声器作用与电话的送话器很相像.

sentences.en: The most wonderful program has been recorded sound and has sowed out in the transmitter - receiver.
sentences.cn: 最精采的节目已录了音并在电台播出.

sentences.en: The transmitter - receiver housing contains the light source and all electronic and control functions.
sentences.cn: 发射器和接收器内装有光源和所有电子元件和控制元件.

sentences.en: The transmitter is wired for up - scale thermocouple burn - out protection.
sentences.cn: 变送器上壳连有热电偶烧毁保护接线.

sentences.en: The transmitter they stole was for a modern UAV?
sentences.cn: 她们所偷的传输器是给无人航空器的模型用的?

sentences.en: The transmitter was pulsed by an electron tube.
sentences.cn: 电子管使发射器产生脉冲波.

sentences.en: These high - frequency shout waves are only able to travel in straight paths from the transmitter.
sentences.cn: 这些高频短波从发射机发出后只能从直线传播.

sentences.en: They live within range of the transmitter.
sentences.cn: 他们住在无线电发射机的有效范围以内.

sentences.en: They tested the range of this transmitter.
sentences.cn: 他们测试了这台发射机的发射范围.

sentences.en: This transmitter will be beamed at East Asia.
sentences.cn: 这台发射机将用于对东亚广播.

sentences.en: When there is a modulated signal from transmitter, there are side bands.
sentences.cn: 只要在发射机中存在调制信号, 就含有旁频带出现.

words.tran_cn: 能传送的；能透射的；可传达的
传动装置，[机] 变速器；传递；传送；播送
传递，发射（transmite的现在分词形式）
传输；传播；发射；传达；遗传
[电讯][通信]发射机，发报机；传达人

能级传送器；液面传感器；物位变送器

trans.tran_cn: 传送者，传达者，发射机，发报机
trans.tran_en: equipment that sends out radio or television signals
